arts.ttl: Evan Khouri stars as Grimsby boost play-off bid with win at Colchester
arts.sum: The midfielder set up the first goal before scoring the winner.

arts.ttl: Colchester star Samson Tovide on founding his own football team and promotion dream
arts.sum: EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW: Samson Tovide has been working hard to give opportunities to kids in his hometown of Hackney as well as playing his part in Colchester United's promotion push

arts.ttl: Friday's League Two predictions including Colchester vs. Grimsby
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League Two fixtures, including Colchester United vs. Grimsby Town.

Both sides are neck and neck as they try and enter the end of season playoffs. With only eight games left this is a playoff six pointer for both sides. Grimsby are currently one point above Colcheste...
